short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab page using Dark Sky weather data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ... a weather widget using data from Dark Sky to get weather information for your location.  You can search for any place and update the widget, get relevant links for Dark Sky and Google Maps, save your searches if you want, and customize appearance options.
